casebody.data:
Grafton, /

June 4,1935.) Clark J. Harding, Adm’r v. Alice S. Hewes. Same v. Harry D. Webb. Fred S. Wright (by brief and orally), for the plaintiff. Frank S. Williams (by brief and orally), for Alice S. Hewes. John F. Cronin, for Harry D. Webb, furnished no brief. Per Curiam.

The law is well settled that money voluntarily paid under a mistake of law cannot be recovered. Keazar v. Bank, 75 N. H. 278, 280, and cases cited; Clough v. Railroad, 77 N. H. 222, 251; Page, Contracts, (2d ed.) s. 1564.

Judgments for the defendants.
